## GTPN Hackathon
We are proud to be hosting the first Hackathon for the Tibetan community in the U.S.A.
While this event is directed to catering the Tibetan Commnity, everyone is welcome to join!

For more information, visit the [Hackathon Website](https://rinchenlama0075.github.io/GTPN-Hackathon/)

## Networking Events
GTPN is excited to announce that we host networking events for professional at the last Thursday of every month! To get the most updated informatino about all the GTPN events, follow us on instagram!
